contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Protected area | name = Young State Park | iucn_category = | photo = | photo_caption = | photo_width = 288 | map = USA Michigan | map_caption = Location within the state of Michigan | map_width = 250 | location = [[Evangeline Township, Michigan|Evangeline Township]], [[Charlevoix County, Michigan|Charlevoix County]], [[Michigan|Michigan, USA]] | nearest_city = [[Boyne City, Michigan]] | region = US-MI | lat_d = 45 | lat_m = 13 | lat_s = 55 | lat_NS = N | long_d = 85 | long_m = 02 | long_s = 54 | long_EW = W | area = 563 acres (2.3 kmÂ²) | established = | visitation_num = | visitation_year = | governing_body = [[Michigan Department of Natural Resources]] | url = http://www.dnr.state.mi.us/parksandtrails/details.aspx?id=512&type=SPRK }} '''Young State Park''' is a {{convert|563|acre|km2|1|sing=on}} [[state park]] in the [[U.S. State]] of [[Michigan]]. It is located near [[Boyne City, Michigan|Boyne City]] in [[Charlevoix County, Michigan|Charlevoix County]] in the northwest of [[Northern Michigan]]. The park, which sits on the eastern edge of {{convert|17260|acre|km2|1|sing=on}} [[Lake Charlevoix]], offers numerous opportunities for land- and water-based recreation. == Facilities and activities == *[[Human swimming|Swimming]] *[[Hiking]]. The park offers five miles of nature trails. *[[Cross-country skiing]]. Ski trails are groomed. *[[Fishing]]: Lake Charlevoix is stocked with lake, brown and rainbow trout; little anglers can try for sunfish and rock bass stocked in Mirror Pond. *[[Boating]]: A launch gives vessels under 16 feet in length access to Lake Charlevoix. *[[Picnicking]] *[[Playground]] *[[Camping]]: Three campgrounds offer overnighters 240 modern campsites and two mini cabins. *[[Metal detector|Metal Detecting]]: Metal detecting is permitted in designated areas of the park; however, any found items are subject to review by park staff and may be retained pending further investigation. ==External links== *[http://www.michigandnr.com/parksandtrails/Details.aspx?id=512&type=SPRK Young State Park] [[Michigan Department of Natural Resources]] *[http://www.michigandnr.com/publications/pdfs/RecreationCamping/metal-maps/young.PDF Young State Park Metal Detecting Map] Michigan DNR *[http://www.protectedplanet.net/sites/Young_State_Park Young State Park] Protected Planet (World Database on Protected Areas) {{Michigan state parks}} [[Category:Campgrounds in the United States]] [[Category:Protected areas of Charlevoix County, Michigan]] [[Category:State parks of Michigan]] {{michigan-geo-stub}}
